nodes.bodyText: Good point! I'm adding a boolean parameter to the JavaFxUtil method, that signifies if negative values should be allowed in the text field.
constants like 0 and 3000 need to go away... should be something like null, null

nodes.bodyText: Nowhere should constants be found that imply a max or a min rating.... There is no max and no min rating. If no max rating is set then there is no max rating....
Yeah now I'm changing from int to Integers I will need those. Or am I missing something else?
use Integer so you can set it to null
I think there is a PlayerBuilder
For these tests only the rating is relevant so don't think using the player builder gives any value. Do you disagree?

No filtering needs to be done !!! The server already filters the game so they fit your rating. If the rating it not enforced the games are not filtered by the server and the rating only acts as a description.
this is already done by the server
Makes sense... But also that makes me a sad panda.
